body_html:
I also am getting the ImportError but I have located libcudart.so.8.0 inside /usr/local/cuda-8.0/lib64 and I have the symlink cuda pointing to cuda-8.0.

I have received a warning when installing cuda 8 that I needed to have at least nvidia driver 361, which I ignored because I have 367.57

body:
I also am getting the ImportError but I have located libcudart.so.8.0 inside /usr/local/cuda-8.0/lib64 and I have the symlink cuda pointing to cuda-8.0.

I have received a warning when installing cuda 8 that I needed to have at least nvidia driver 361, which I ignored because I have 367.57
